4Media Video Converter - is a universal program for encoding / decoding HD video, convert video and audio files between different formats and extract audio from video or images. With this software, you can merge several files into one file and apply various transition effects. New version includes the ability to convert 3D, normal videos can be converted to 3D-video, or in a variety of 3D-format. The program uses NVIDIA CUDA technology to increase the speed of conversion is 5 times on any computer where the processor supports CUDA.
Supports most popular video formats, including AVI, MPEG, WMV, DivX, MP4, H.264/AVC, AVCHD, MKV, RM, MOV, XviD, 3GP and others, extracting audio from video to MP3, WMA, WAV, RA, M4A, AAC, AC3, MP2, OGG and other formats, batch conversion, preview in the embedded player, selection and setup of audio and video codecs, setting the parameters of conversion, a simple and intuitive interface.
_____________________________

the ability to convert 3D, normal videos can be converted to 3D-video, or in various 3D-formats

Support iPod, Apple TV, PSP, PS3, Zune, Archos, iRiver, Creative Zen audio and video formats
converting videos from one format to another
Extract audio to MP3, WMA, OGG, AAC, M4A, WAV, AC3 formats
Check the video effects that are applied - to help you to check the effect that is applied, 4Media Video Converter offers original and fixed video comparison function.
